author: Anonymous Helix
title: Failing the final
question:
Hi
I just have a quick question about the grade. I did the final yesterday and I didn’t think I do very well on that too. I have already failed once for this class. If I fail this class again, should I apply the form to the faculty of science because this is the prerequisite for my major.
Thanks
student_answer:
In the case you really fail the class, contact science advising for next steps, they will want to work out a plan for you if they do let you retake the class. Until then get some rest, tests usually feel worse than they really were.
Good luck!
